sentences.sContent: If you see a guy looking distraught while comparing the active ingredients of various toothpastes, look again. That might be me.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you see a guy looking distraught while comparing the active ingredients of various toothpastes, look again. That might be me.
sentences.sCn: 如果你看到一个抓狂的家伙正在比较不同牙膏的活性成分，仔细看一眼，那说不定就是我。

sentences.sContent: One Republican committee chairman was plainly distraught when he told a White House aide that he didn’t want to vote for impeachment but he would lose his chairmanship if he voted against it.
sentences.sContent_eng: One Republican committee chairman was plainly distraught when he told a White House aide that he didn’t want to vote for impeachment but he would lose his chairmanship if he voted against it.
sentences.sCn: 一个任委员会主席的共和党人简直就是发了狂，他对一名白宫助手说，他并不想投票支持弹劾，但如果他投反对票就会失去主席的职位。

remMethod.val: 由distract(v. 分散注意力； 使不安)变化而来
